error.message: Sorry! The page you were looking for may have moved or you may have been redirected here by mistake.

help.bugs: Please send any bug reports to the email 'bugs@openkanji.com'. Add as much information as you can including a description of the issue, your web browser type and version, steps to reproduce, screenshots, etc. Everything helps.
help.requests: Please do not ask me to translate anything. I am NOT qualified as a translator.
help.requestsTitle: Can you help me with translating something?
help.whatIsThisSite: Open Kanji is a series of Japanese-to-English companion tools designed to help solve the universal issue every learner faces - looking up unknown kanji. And while Open Kanji does pull from online dictionaries, I would still encourage using established resources like Jisho if you require even better results.
help.suggestions: At this time I'm not accepting feature requests as I already have a lot planned. When that changes I will update this entry with more information. Sorry!
help.suggestionsTitle: I have a suggestion for the website!
